========= bio_utils =========

.. image:: logo/bio_utils_logo_120.png

Summary

bio_utils is a library of Python modules performing routine functions in bioinformatic scripts.

Installation

::

pip install bio_utils

Documentation

bio_utils documentation is hosted at Read the Docs <http://bio-utils.readthedocs.io/en/latest/>. A copy of this documentation is included in docs <docs>.

Copyright

bio_utils operates under GPLv3 <LICENSE>_ and may be shared, modified, and redistributed as per that license.
